name: J. Robert Scott
overview:
J. Robert Scott is an executive search and recruiting firm.

Founded in 1986, J. Robert Scott is a retainer-based executive search firm specializing in the recruitment of senior level executives for a wide array of companies in technology, financial services, biomedical, biopharmaceutical and higher education/not for profit fields. Executive search at J. Robert Scott is rooted in a commitment to identifying great people to advance the strategic goals of our clientsâ€™ organizations. Our firm maintains the highest ethical standards and impeccable customer service; these values serve as touchstones for our practice and help us earn and maintain a reputation for professional excellence. J. Robert Scott is headquartered in Boston with offices in San Francisco, London, Hong Kong and Singapore.
